## HandlerParameters type

Extracts the types of the additional arguments of a [HandlerFunction](./opensearch-dashboards.handlerfunction.md)<!-- -->, excluding the [HandlerContextType](./opensearch-dashboards.handlercontexttype.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HandlerParameters<T extends HandlerFunction<any>> = T extends (context: any, ...args: infer U) => any ? U : never;
```
<b>References:</b> [HandlerFunction](./opensearch-dashboards.handlerfunction.md)
